Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Projector::Projector ( int *  pointer,
unsigned int  len 
)

Creates a new projector with buffer of size len at the place pointer with position (0,0,0) and direction (0,0,0)

Parameters:
pointerPointer to the rendering buffer.
lenSize of buffer in bytes.
Projector::Projector ( int *  pointer,
unsigned int  len,
Vec3  pos,
Vec3  dir 
)

Creates a new projector with a buffer of size len at the place pointer with position pos and direction dir

Parameters:
pointerPointer to the rendering buffer.
lenSize of buffer in bytes.
posPosition of the projector.

Calculates the the keystone matrix and sets a uniform

Parameters:
pidis the shader program used when drawing
void Projector::display ( Scene  scene)

Displays the view through the projector associated with this instance. Prior to that it will also possibly have applied color settings and definitely applied keystone correction on the view.

Parameters:
takesa scene and draws in the current window

void Projector::moveKeystoneCorner ( int  corner,
int  xory,
float  value 
)

An interface to move the corners of the projected image, changing the observed values so that a new Keystone matrix can be calculated.

Parameters:
cornerWhich of the four coners to change
xoryStates which component of the coordinate of a corner that should be changed X=0 Y=1
valueIs the value to increase or decrease the component with
